name: Dark Parables: Jack and the Sky Kingdom HD - A Hidden Object Fairy Tale
name_original: Dark Parables: Jack and the Sky Kingdom HD - A Hidden Object Fairy Tale
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

The legendary Sky Kingdom suddenly appears and a destructive barrage is unleashed upon an unsuspecting town. Play as the Fairytale Detective and embark on an investigation to rescue the townspeople!

• HELP JACK RESCUE HIS FIANCÉE
Unravel a tale of lost love, a fragmented family, and a treasure that has the power to destroy the world.

• CLIMB THE BEANSTALK TO THE LEGENDARY SKY KINGDOM
The sudden appearance of a mysterious floating island sparks horror when an onslaught of destruction is unleashed on the town.

• UNCOVER A SECRET PAST
Follow Jack through an exciting adventure to find clues and hidden objects while using your wits to solve challenging mini-games and puzzles! It’s up to you to discover the tragic history behind the chaos!

• MEET RUMPELSTILTSKIN IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Along your journey, find and collect note pieces to complete five parables. Enjoy extras like breathtaking wallpapers and concept artwork!
